name: Funk Foil
description:
--Controls--

WASD - Move Sword

↑ ↓ - Angle Sword

← → - Step

--Goal--

Stab the Knight for a point, 5 points to win.

Use the indicators in the bottom right to find out what your foe will do.

The Knight will become smarter and rethink their strategy more often whenever they are defeated.

--Credit--

Music Credit : Linxin
